outline:
1. to storm, rage
    1. (Qal)
      1. to storm
      2. stormy, growing storm (participle)
    2. (Niphal) to be enraged
    3. (Piel) to storm away
    4. (Pual) to be driven by storm
kjv_def: be (toss with) tempest(-uous), be sore, troubled, come out as a (drive with the, scatter with a) whirlwind.
strongs_def: to rush upon; by implication, to toss (transitive or intransitive, literal or figurative)
